item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Absolutely. And in many ways, I think go relates to a lot of other things as well. It's what makes the game worth the studying and life-long pursuit.
item.content:encoded: Absolutely. And in many ways, I think go relates to a lot of other things as well. It’s what makes the game worth the studying and life-long pursuit.

item.title: By: Ben

item.description: Thank you! I'm glad you enjoyed it!
item.content:encoded: Thank you! I’m glad you enjoyed it!

item.title: By: Moboy78
item.dc:creator: Moboy78
item.description: Nice analogy. Reminds me of something a friend told me during a xc race a while back about breathing to. Sure are a lot of things that can be related to Go.
item.content:encoded: Nice analogy. Reminds me of something a friend told me during a xc race a while back about breathing to. Sure are a lot of things that can be related to Go.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: That sounds like a great habit to pick up. Haha. I usually get so focused on the board I end up playing with super kyu vision. I'll have to try your method!
item.content:encoded: That sounds like a great habit to pick up. Haha. I usually get so focused on the board I end up playing with super kyu vision. I’ll have to try your method!

item.title: By: Devin Flake
item.dc:creator: Devin Flake
item.description: Nice - I often sit back and take deep breaths before I play a move. It gives you a little more time to think and clear your head :)
item.content:encoded: Nice – I often sit back and take deep breaths before I play a move. It gives you a little more time to think and clear your head ðŸ™‚
